metadata.dc:author: De Montagut i Figuerol, Carme
Vilana González, Jordi
metadata.dc:description: This article describes the procedure used to define those competencies which the "CHC Fundacío Personalia" (Hospital Consortium of Catalonia's Personalia Foundation) desired for the personal caretakers collective which works in its centers and to develop specific instruments to evaluate the competency profiles of candidates to become part of this organization in this working category.
metadata.dc:title: Construcción de un modelo de competencias para el personal cuidador.
[Constructing a model of competencies for a personal caretaker].
